an3.74:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā ānando vesāliyaṃ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ.
an3.74:4.2: Atha kho abhayo ca licchavi paṇḍitakumārako ca licchavi yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
an3.74:4.3: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
an3.74:4.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho abhayo licchavi āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavoca:
an3.74:4.5: “nigaṇṭho, bhante, nāṭaputto sabbaññū sabbadassāvī aparisesaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ paṭijānāti:
an3.74:4.6: ‘carato ca me tiṭṭhato ca suttassa ca jāgarassa ca satataṃ samitaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ paccupaṭṭhitan’ti.
an3.74:4.7: So purāṇānaṃ kammānaṃ tapasā byantībhāvaṃ paññāpeti navānaṃ kammānaṃ akaraṇā setughātaṃ.
an3.74:4.8: Iti kammakkhayā dukkhakkhayo, dukkhakkhayā vedanākkhayo, vedanākkhayā sabbaṃ dukkhaṃ nijjiṇṇaṃ bhavissati—
an3.74:4.9: evametissā sandiṭṭhikāya nijjarāya visuddhiyā samatikkamo hoti.
an3.74:5.1: “Tisso kho imā, abhaya, nijjarā visuddhiyo tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena sammadakkhātā sattānaṃ visuddhiyā sokaparidevānaṃ samatikkamāya dukkhadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamāya ñāyassa adhigamāya nibbānassa sacchikiriyāya.
an3.74:5.3: Idha, abhaya, bhikkhu sīlavā hoti … pe …
an3.74:5.5: So navañca kammaṃ na karoti, purāṇañca kammaṃ phussa phussa byantīkaroti.
an3.74:5.6: Sandiṭṭhikā nijjarā akālikā ehipassikā opaneyyikā paccattaṃ veditabbā viññūhīti.
an3.74:6.1: Sa kho so, abhaya, bhikkhu evaṃ sīlasampanno vivicceva kāmehi … pe …
an3.74:6.3: So navañca kammaṃ na karoti, purāṇañca kammaṃ phussa phussa byantīkaroti.
an3.74:6.4: Sandiṭṭhikā nijjarā akālikā ehipassikā opaneyyikā paccattaṃ veditabbā viññūhīti.
an3.74:7.1: Sa kho so, abhaya, bhikkhu evaṃ samādhisampanno āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
an3.74:7.2: So navañca kammaṃ na karoti, purāṇañca kammaṃ phussa phussa byantīkaroti.
an3.74:7.3: Sandiṭṭhikā nijjarā akālikā ehipassikā opaneyyikā paccattaṃ veditabbā viññūhīti.
an3.74:7.4: Imā kho, abhaya, tisso nijjarā visuddhiyo tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena sammadakkhātā sattānaṃ visuddhiyā sokaparidevānaṃ samatikkamāya dukkhadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamāya ñāyassa adhigamāya nibbānassa sacchikiriyāyā”ti.
an3.74:8.1: Evaṃ vutte, paṇḍitakumārako licchavi abhayaṃ licchaviṃ etadavoca:
an3.74:8.2: “kiṃ pana tvaṃ, samma abhaya, āyasmato ānandassa subhāsitaṃ subhāsitato nābbhanumodasī”ti?
an3.74:8.3: “Kyāhaṃ, samma paṇḍitakumāraka, āyasmato ānandassa subhāsitaṃ subhāsitato nābbhanumodissāmi.
an3.74:8.4: Muddhāpi tassa vipateyya yo āyasmato ānandassa subhāsitaṃ subhāsitato nābbhanumodeyyā”ti.
